description: easy to follow trail, trail isn't maintained but is in good shape, the trail start near a pond and follow the power line for a little bit. you come to a trail on the left into the wood. a short ways up the trail you come to a logging road. head left again and follow the raod into a clearcut, head up the road until hit the woods, now your back into the forest again.
directions: head south to lantzville from nanaimo turn onto left onto Superior Rd and drive to starting location and park.
title: Lantzille Foothill 3
